fr.gestion_contenu.ports.InPortContentManagementFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentManagementClientCI, FacadeContentManagementCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.InboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, Serializable, Remote
public class InPortContentManagementFacade extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort implements FacadeContentManagementCI
Author:
Hamid KOLLI, Yanis ALAYOUD Classe qui represente le port entrant d'un client pour recuperer les resultats des requetes find et match
